corrections.original_fact: 10 missing skiers after an avalanche in California
corrections.corrected_fact: Eight skiers died in an avalanche in California.
corrections.reason: The new verified fact states that 8 skiers died in the avalanche, contradicting the earlier report of 10 missing skiers. This represents a significant factual discrepancy in the number of people involved.

corrections.original_fact: Mexican army reports death of drug trafficking organization leader Ismael Oseguera Cervantes
corrections.corrected_fact: The Mexican army killed cartel leader Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as 'El Mencho.'
corrections.reason: The previously published story identifies the killed cartel leader as 'Ismael Oseguera Cervantes,' but the new verified fact confirms his name is 'Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes' (known as 'El Mencho'). This is a direct contradiction in the identity of the person killed.
